descriptrion:
Displays the participant's balance as well as possible rewards that can be collected

If no participant is specified, the value is taken by the one who started the command
examples: Displays the balance of the lordcode participant
Displays the balance of the participant with id 636824998123798531
name: balance

descriptrion: Shows statistics of the top 10 server participants by balance
name: leaderboard

descriptrion: Transfers the specified amount to the selected participant
examples: Transfers 100 coins to the account of the lordcode participant
Transfers 100 coins to the participant's account from ID 636824998123798531
name: pay

descriptrion: Issues a cash reward once a day
name: daily

descriptrion: Issues a cash reward once a week
name: weekly

descriptrion: Issues a cash reward once a month
name: monthly

brief_descriptrion: Transfers the entered amount of money to the bank
descriptrion: Transfers the entered amount of money to the bank protecting your funds from robbery
examples: Transfers all coins to the bank
name: deposit

brief_descriptrion: Transfers the amount back to the account
descriptrion:
Redirects your funds from the bank back to your account

Please note that if you lose your funds, it is not possible to return them
examples: Transfers 100 coins from the bank back to your account
Transfers all coins from the bank back to your account
name: withdraw

brief_descriptrion: Adds the amount to the participant
descriptrion:
Adds a certain amount to the selected participant
If the participant is not selected, the team performer acts instead
name: gift

brief_descriptrion: Takes the amount to the participant
descriptrion:
Takes a certain amount to the selected participant
If the participant is not selected, the team performer acts instead
name: take

descriptrion: A command describing the bot's functions
name: help

descriptrion: Shows the performance and current status of the bot
name: ping

descriptrion: Issues a link inviting the bot to the server
name: invite

descriptrion: Shows a picture on which the text is encrypted within 30 seconds the user must solve the captcha
name: captcha

descriptrion: Enters the channel with the user who called the command
name: join

descriptrion: Comes out the channel with the user who called the command
name: leave

descriptrion:
Starts playing the music set by the user
As a cloud with music is [**Yandex Music**](<https://music.yandex.ru>)
examples: play A Sky Full of Stars
Run a search for the song `A Sky Full of Stars` and it will prompt you to choose the desired author.
Launch the song from the specified link.
name: play

descriptrion: Stops the current music stream
name: stop

descriptrion: Stops the current music stream in the future which can be continued
name: pause

descriptrion: Resumes the music stream that was completed by the necessary means in order to continue in the future
name: resume

descriptrion: Set the volume to the current music stream from 1 to 100
examples: Sets the maximum volume for music.
name: volume

brief_descriptrion: Clears the chat the specified number of times
descriptrion: Clears the chat the specified number of times
examples: Clear the last 10 messages in the channel
name: purge

brief_descriptrion: Clears the chat a specified number of times after the specified user sends a message.
descriptrion: Clears the chat a specified number of times after the specified user sends a message.
examples: Clear the last 10 messages sent by the lordcode member in the channel
name: purge user

descriptrion: Clears the chat between messages
examples: Clears the chat between message 1214583337776320524 and 1214584228889497610
Clears the chat from message 1214583337776320524 to the current one
name: purge between

brief_descriptrion: Restricts the user's access to the server completely
descriptrion: Restricts the user's access to the server completely
examples: Will ban lordcode for 10 minutes due to advertising
Ban a participant with ID 636824998123798531 for 1 hour for no reason
name: ban

brief_descriptrion: Issues a sheet with all temporary bans that were issued by the bot
descriptrion: Issues a sheet with all temporary bans that were issued by the bot
name: ban list

brief_descriptrion: Adds roles to a certain participant for a while or forever
descriptrion:
Adds roles to a certain participant for a while or forever
You can summarize the roles
The time is indicated in the format `1d1h1m1s` the values can be combined and also duplicated, for example `1d2h1d`
examples: Issues the role of role for 12 hours to the participant lordcode.
name: temp-role

brief_descriptrion: Provides a list of temporary roles for the server or member
descriptrion:
Provides a list of temporary roles for the server or member.
If `member` is not specified, it shows a list of all temporary roles on the server.
If specified, it shows only those roles that belong to the participant.
The roles assigned to are always not shown in the list.
examples: Shows all temporary roles assigned to the lordcode member
name: temp-role list

descriptrion: Sends a message on behalf of the bot using a unique [**embed builder**](</embed>) or plain text
examples: Send embed with title `Hello` to the current chat.
name: say

descriptrion: Opens special bot management settings as well as its extensions
name: settings

brief_descriptrion: Opens the menu for creating a giveaway!
descriptrion: Opens the menu for creating a giveaway!
name: giveaway

brief_descriptrion: Stops playing the current song and starts playing the next one.
descriptrion: Stops playing the current song and starts playing the next one.
name: skip

descriptrion: Opens the Server Role Store
name: shop

descriptrion: Shows the participant's avatar!
examples: It will show the avatar of the participant with the username lordcode
It will show the avatar of the participant with the id 636824998123798531
name: avatar

descriptrion: Shows the participant's avatar!
examples: Shows the latest invitations from the entire server
It will show the latest invitations of the participant with the nickname @lordcode
It will show the latest invitations of the participant with the id 636824998123798531
name: invites

brief_descriptrion: Will switch to the track in the queue
descriptrion: Will switch to the track in the queue
examples: Will start producing 5 tracks in the queue
name: move

brief_descriptrion: It reminds you of the specified text at a certain time
descriptrion: It reminds you of the specified text at a certain time
examples: To remind you after 14 days about the daily reward
name: reminder

brief_descriptrion: The 'reactions' command offers a wide range of emotional reactions to enrich your communication. Express your feelings from joy to anger with various gestures and facial expressions.
descriptrion: The 'reactions' command allows you to use various reactions to express emotions and character responses. Here you will find a wide range of actions, from simple smiles and hugs to more expressive reactions such as shouting, biting, or even a funny sneeze. Use these reactions to add depth and liveliness to your role-playing scenes or communication with other chat participants. Immerse yourself in the world of emotions and expressions available through the 'reactions' command.
examples: Sends a message about the kisses of the participant @lordcode
It will show that you are blushing
name: reactions
